plays.text: Penalty to Brian Sutherby 2 minutes for High Sticking Pierre Dagenais
Penalty to Ryan Johnson 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Jaromir Jagr
Goal scored by Robert Lang assisted by Michael Nylander and Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Robert Lang 2 minutes for Tripping Ivan Novoseltsev
Penalty to Marcus Nilson 2 minutes for Charging(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Sandis Ozolinsh 2 minutes for Tripping Dainius Zubrus
Penalty to Pierre Dagenais 2 minutes for Hooking Dainius Zubrus
Penalty to Peter Worrell 2 minutes for Interference Dainius Zubrus
Goal scored by Kristian Huselius assisted by Jay Bouwmeester and Dmitry Yushkevich
Penalty to Brian Sutherby 2 minutes for Elbowing Pierre Dagenais
Penalty to Sandis Ozolinsh 2 minutes for Boarding Steve Konowalchuk
Penalty to Kip Miller 2 minutes for Hooking Sandis Ozolinsh
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Jeff Halpern and Calle Johansson
